name: fresh capsule - Food Management App
description: "fresh capsule" is a mobile application designed to manage the expiration dates of purchased food items. By photographing the section where the expiration date is printed with a smartphone, the expiration date is automatically added to a list within the app.

video.name: fresh capsule - Food Management App
video.description: "fresh capsule" is a mobile application designed to manage the expiration dates of purchased food items. By photographing the section where the expiration date is printed with a smartphone, the expiration date is automatically added to a list within the app.

educationalLevel: Primary and Secondary Education (Ages 17 and under)
